title: RRC shall be located at a suitable location within the respective planning sector layout and not necessarily be on the plot where they exist at present
clause_text: RRC shall be located at a suitable location within the respective planning sector layout and not necessarily be on the plot where they exist at present. In case of any site constraints, the same may be allowed to be located outside the particular sector layout, but within the DNA, with the special permission of OSD, DRP(SRA).
